title: SLOWDRIFT
descrption: SLOWDRIFT is a backdoor used by APT37 against academic and strategic victims in South Korea. [1]

references.title: FireEye. (2018, February 20). APT37 (Reaper): The Overlooked North Korean Actor. Retrieved March 1, 2018.

related.Name: System Information Discovery
related.Use: SLOWDRIFT collects and sends system information to its C2.[1]

related.Name: Web Service
related.Use: SLOWDRIFT uses cloud based services for C2.[1]
